definition: produced with the muscles involved in a relatively tense state
examples: the vowels \ē\ and \ü\ in contrast with the vowels \i\ and \u̇\ are tense
tensed up and missed the putt

definition: a distinction of form in a verb to express distinctions of time or duration of the action or state it denotes
a set of inflectional forms of a verb that express distinctions of time
an inflectional form of a verb expressing a specific time distinction
